page.title: 06EVENTS IN HULCOTE & SALFORD.
page.content: During the year beginning June or July a Fete with its stalls of home made produce, flowers and vegetables, side shows and sports is held followed by a supper and disco in the Village Hall for adults and young people. In September a coffee evening is arranged. This social event takes place at one of the larger houses in the area. The Harvest Festival of the first fruits,a thank-offering for the produce of the earth is celebrated in the church and the supper is prepared by the Womens' Institute. The Bazaar follows, more of the home-made cakes, toys, knitted goods and gifts are sold. The Christmas Nativity is held in Salford Church which is full of flowers for the occasion to to bring joy to all. Money raised at these events goes to the upkeep of the Church and Hall.
